portfolio.title: Engineering Case Studies
portfolio.subtitle: A showcase of high-performance architecture and digital transformation across diverse industries.

projects.title: Nexus Logistics: Global Supply Chain Cloud Migration
projects.description: Transforming fragmented legacy infrastructure into a unified, cloud-native logistics orchestrator.
projects.problem: Fragmented legacy infrastructure causing bottlenecks and frequent downtime.
projects.solution: Implemented a cloud-native AWS architecture with Go-based microservices for real-time tracking.

projects.title: Aura Fashion: High-Load E-Commerce Re-Engineering
projects.description: Scaling a luxury fashion brand for peak traffic without downtime.
projects.problem: Server crashes during high-traffic events like Black Friday, leading to lost sales.
projects.solution: Re-engineered with Next.js and Redis caching to handle 100x traffic spikes seamlessly.

projects.title: FinNode: Secure Open Banking API Ecosystem
projects.description: Building a resilient, compliant gateway for secure financial data exchange.
projects.problem: Lack of a secure, compliant environment for financial data exchange with third-party providers.
projects.solution: Created a robust Laravel-based API ecosystem with multi-factor authentication and full audit logging.
